nodes.text: Comet Busters was a company that operated in the Cularin system during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Comet Busters was owned by the Human Nad Baron and specialized in destroying rogue comets in the Cularin system. As a rival firm, the Comet Broom Service, got most of the best comet contracts, Comet Busters often took less lucrative jobs that were sub-contracted out to them by Comet Broom.

During the time of the Clone Wars, the owners of Comet Broom supplied a group of freelance agents with some astrometric data, while on Artom Station. Some Comet Busters employees learned of this, so they attacked the agents on the station, in an attempt to obtain the data.
